Hellplague:
 
"Well, we can't let you leave now.  We can't have you telling others where we are.  So you repair things, could you help repair whats left of this ship?" the Sweep commander asked, lowering her weapons but still keeping an optic on him.

Alex Sell <kraftlos@...> wrote:
"Do you intend to shoot me, or are you going to put down your guns?"
asked Celeron in a more irritated voice looking toward Helplaggue,
then he turned to Blacknightmare, "My business is my own, I do not
wish to discuss it.  Can you tell me where I am, I have been offline
for some time and I do not know where I am or how long I have been
here."
